name: No one lives under the lighthouse
storyline:
You arrive at the old lighthouse on a small island near the coast of the United States. After the previous keeper has gone missing, you need to take over his duties and watch after the light. The member of the Establishment told you they'll get you an assistant after a week or two, but right now you're on your own. 
 
Enjoy your time away from the crowded cities. Explore the island and get busy in a light-keeper routine.
summary: A retro horror game, in which you arrive at the old lighthouse on a small island near the coast of the United States. After the previous keeper has gone missing, you need to take over his duties and watch after the light.
